scripts.build: cmake-js compile && emcc -O3 -Wno-unused-value clang/wasm.c clang/core/*.c -o dist/offscreen-dom-wasm.js -sINITIAL_HEAP=1024MB -sSTACK_SIZE=512MB -sINITIAL_MEMORY=2048MB --bind -sMODULARIZE=1 -sEXPORT_ES6=1 -sNO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -sEXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=ccall,wasmMemory,stringToNewUTF8,UTF8ToString,HEAPU32 -sEXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=_malloc,_free
